entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 4 April 2023
